website_summaries.verdict: Though not everyone can take them, these taste great. Worth considering if you want gummy vitamins and don't mind the large dose.
pros: Tasty adult gummy formula that is easy to take and doesn't contain artificial ingredients or preservatives
Good source of folate and contains omega-3 DHA/EPA oils
cons: Made of swine-based gelatin that is unacceptable for some diets

customer_reviews.title: Ugh - contains 32% of daily recommended sugar intake per serving!
customer_reviews.text: Why the heck is there so much sugar in this?? We’re not kids and don’t need that amount of sugar. For a product that promotes health they do an awful job of promoting obesity with such sugary products. The World Health Organization (WHO) recommends a maximum of 25 grams of sugar per day, and this product has 8 grams per serving, or about 32% of the daily recommended intake. The obesity epidemic is being driven by high sugar intake. This only serves to promote it while it "helps" you get your vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Dummy

customer_reviews.title: Way too sweet
customer_reviews.text: This is the third variation of smartypants gummies that I've bought. The "Adult complete plus Fiber" and the "Mens Complete" were both fantastic. Great flavor and texture. These are covered in sugar, making them much sweeter than the other ones I've tried, and much messier (the sugar gets all over your hands and falls onto the floor/table/etc. too. Eating six really just tastes like I'm eating a handful of straight sugar. To make matters worse, I tried returning the product so I could go back to one of the previous versions I had, and the seller doesn't accept returns or do refunds.
customer_reviews.author: Pre-K Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Too much added sugar!
customer_reviews.text: I give it three star rating just because of the high amount of added sugar. Stevia would be better choice. Too much sugar in our lives. Bought these originally for my 10 and 13 year old boys-just gave them half dose. Opted out for regular multivitamins without all the sugar.
customer_reviews.author: sylvuska73

customer_reviews.title: but did not like the taste
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my boys as another reviewer had suggested. They were taking 2..... but did not like the taste, said too sugary. They switched to One A Day for teen boys and enjoy those. That leaves the SP vits for me..... I'm supposed to take 6 according to the back.... there is no way I can do 6, and I LOVE sweets. I can do 2 a day, until they are gone. I really wanted to love these after all the great reviews. To give you an indication of my sweet tooth- I use 6 Splenda packets in a mug of coffee and can still add flavored creamer.
customer_reviews.author: Family3D1G

customer_reviews.title: Helped with dry eyes, but I wish it had more biotin
customer_reviews.text: I actually remember to take these (because they’re a treat)! I was taking Trader joe’s Fish oil capsules, started taking these instead and my dry eyes have gotten significantly better, with no other change. I wish this version had 100% of the daily recommendation for biotin since weak hair and nails are a concern for me.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Page

customer_reviews.title: Yummy and healthy
customer_reviews.text: I’m a health coach, so I tend to be picky on what my teens get. But I also have a very picky eater—he’s on the spectrum—so I have to get vitamins that are palatable for him. He LOVES these. I love that they have Omega 3, as well as a decent mineral profile, and that they have good quality ingredients. We see a real difference in our teens’ immune health and energy levels when they take these!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Tenney

customer_reviews.title: I don't like the taste. Too many to eat per serving. Will not purchase this type again.
customer_reviews.text: I don't care for the taste of these and I don't like that you have to take so many! It's a good quality product. I just wish they had them in a gummy bear-like flavor and nothing coated with sugar. These didn't go to waste as I gave them away to a relative who eats them. I also purchased the kids' version and they have no complaints. To them, it's like a piece of candy every day but I keep it out of their reach.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: New formula has LESS of most vitamins. Now they are really just candy and bad for your teeth.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the old formula. This new formula has significantly less of most of the vitamins. I"m especially sad to see much less of the B-6 and B-12 and zinc . You already need to take six gummies to get these amounts. With the decrease in vitamins these have become mostly gooey candy. They are very chewy and stick to your teeth which will cause tooth decay. I will look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: particular

customer_reviews.title: gumdrop-style gummy vitamins
customer_reviews.text: These work well for adults (6/dose) or kids (4/dose). No bad smell or taste from the omegas. Others pointed out the kid version is the same, but more expensive, so we got these to share. These seem a little more like gumdrops than gummy bears compared to other gummy vitamins we've had.
customer_reviews.author: interiorlulu

customer_reviews.title: Biotin = Breakouts
customer_reviews.text: I would have loved these if it weren't for the biotin. Biotin is pretty well known for causing breakouts in some people, but I decided to risk it with these vitamins since they had a fairly low amount in them as compared to some other multis. Within a couple days of starting these vitamins, I started getting breakouts on my chin/neck, an area I don't typically break out. I stuck with the vitamins and just sucked up the breakouts. Finished the bottle, stopped taking them, skin cleared up. Bought a new bottle a week later, started taking them again, chin/neck broke out. Stopped taking them, skin cleared back up. Will not be continuing with these.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Gummies that taste like candy. Perfect for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Both my wife and I have the MTHFR gene mutation, so this was passed on to our children. Other pills were too large or tasted awful, and the kids wouldn't take them. These are perfect. Same as the kids' product, just need a smaller dosage (4 instead of 6 gummies). They like the taste, and the ingredients are best in class.
customer_reviews.author: DanaCz

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting gummy that my 6 year old loves!
customer_reviews.text: Son loves these! I bought this instead of the labeled kids ones to save $ and he just get 3-4 a day instead. I noticed a slight improvement in his school work and focus ability after about 2 weeks of use. He is also now on a medication to help with focus and I feel the 2 are doing him wonders. I've tried these myself and they are delicious, much much better than the normal omega 3 mutlivit gummies out there.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherFeather

customer_reviews.title: I showed my doctor the vitamins after getting an extensive blood panel done and she said it's not good. That it has Too much sugar and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Have been taking this for months. Didn't notice a change but then again I take quite a bit of different vitamins and herbal supplements on a daily basis. I showed my doctor the vitamins after getting an extensive blood panel done and she said it's not good. That it has Too much sugar and the quantity per vitamin is too low on most things to do anything. I'm now taking specific vitamins recommended by my doctor.
customer_reviews.author: Juan E

customer_reviews.title: You may as well take a regular one-a-day multivitamin with a tsp of sugar
customer_reviews.text: Really did not like all the sugar. Admittedly, my own fault for not closely checking the ingredients before purchasing. But still, these things have so much sugar that it overwhelms the fruity flavor. I suppose these are good if you really have trouble chewing other gummy vitamins and cannot swallow pills, but considering that they recommend 6 of these daily, you may as well get some other multivitamin pill and swallow it with a teaspoon of sugar or honey. That would probably be healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twine

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: this is a great product for someone who has problems swallowing pills. does not have artificial dye or sweetneer. first found at a healthfood store, was cheaper here, saw it at Walmart last week. Just check prices before you buy, With free shipping and discount for subscription buying, it might make a significant difference in savings.
customer_reviews.author: Harriet from Indiana

customer_reviews.title: A little too sweet for our liking!
customer_reviews.text: The amount of sugar in this was too much & caused my 6 year olds teeth to hurt. I tried to give them a try but she couldn't eat them. My twins enjoyed the flavor. I have switched my youngest back to Olly while my twins finish these up. On the hunt for another suitable replacement that the entire family can enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Homeschooling 3 Curly Girls

customer_reviews.title: Upgraded Formula has corn products/derivatives- can't take anymore
customer_reviews.text: I can no longer take these vitamins after they upgraded the formula. I have a corn allergy and for years have been taking this product. After an elimination and reintroduction of these vitamins I figured out that they were causing a severe reaction. These vitamins contain high amounts or higher amounts of corn products or corn derivatives than the original formula. There should be transparency in labeling by Smarty Pants! Shame on them!
customer_reviews.author: calmiss

customer_reviews.title: #1 at our house
customer_reviews.text: These are the only vitamins my family uses . They are tasty easy to to take and even my teenage son wants to take his vitamins. I usually feel sluggish but since using these vitamins I have more energy and feel better all around . With quality ingredients and fair pricing these are #1 in my book .
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: Huge bottle which I love very nice way to take and get your vitamins....only bad part is the sugar layer is a little overkill but I love the amount of vitamins there also needs to be all the ingredients on this bottle my son has strawberry allergies and this would’ve killed him
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Jones

customer_reviews.title: I feel great!
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking these for over a year now. I rarely get sick and if I do catch a cold, it only lasts a few days. Overall I feel great with lots of energy to spare. I'm in my late 40s and used to have some mentally foggy days but not more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Too sweet & sugary.
customer_reviews.text: Delicious!!! And I feel so healthy using these. But... After 2 bottles, I cant buy these anymore, a bit too sugary. Feel sugar crystals on my teethe. Bad for teethe. And Sugar messes up my diet appetite control. Hey SmartyPants. I'll subscribe regularly purchase a healthier sugarless version.
customer_reviews.author: RickWAllen

customer_reviews.title: Covered in sugar... gross.
customer_reviews.text: I was unimpressed because these are coated in sugar. I don’t enjoy vitamins that have hard, crunchy sugar on the outside. I’m used to smarty pants vitamin gummies and they’ve never had the sugar on them. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Federmeyer

customer_reviews.title: I have to take multi-vitamins but hate pills. Also
customer_reviews.text: I have to take multi-vitamins but hate pills. Also, I'm allergic to corn syrup and malixtol which seems to be the first ingredients in gummy vitamins.I did research and found these. A total blessing.plus It satisfies my wanting treats - I don't mind the sugar - and it's doing good things for my body. Now I wish they'd come out Vitamin B-complex 100 since those pills are just nasty tasting! This company really has inspired my brand loyalty as they are doing something much needed. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lady NI

customer_reviews.title: TaSty, omega 3s, more vita, price good, BOOM
customer_reviews.text: Really cool vitamin , all the vitamins you can see but the kicker is the omega-3 and fish oils that did it for me. They actually taste good kind of a citrusy flavor very tolerable. Not an outrageous price
customer_reviews.author: Roco1923

customer_reviews.title: Great for my weenie husband but too much sugar.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best vitamins I can find for my husband that have all the nutrients he needs and are chewable. The biggest thing I don't like about them is the sugar coating. 8 Grams of sugar, really? I will likely get the kids version for him next time because they only have 2 grams. I also wish they have folate rather than folic acid. Overall though, they are truly the best I have found for someone who will not swallow a pill and doesn't like those chalky chewable vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: TASTES SUPER YUMMY LIKE CANDY!  USES METHYL FOLATE WHICH IS AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: These are great with quality ingredients - we DON'T buy anything with folate in for MTHR methylation issues. They have a sugar outside and super yummy - everyone in the house eats these.
customer_reviews.author: Lil Miss Janie Doe - Public Profile

customer_reviews.title: My "Kids" love them
customer_reviews.text: My "Kids" are in their 20's and have been using these for years. Love the flavor, texture, and fact that they take their vitamins especially in these"Corona Virus TImes"
customer_reviews.author: LOIS DORSEY

customer_reviews.title: but he kept complaining about he didn't enjoy swallowing them and asked for gummy type (like a ...
customer_reviews.text: One way to describe this is that: my husband loves it! I used to get him pill form vitamins, but he kept complaining about he didn't enjoy swallowing them and asked for gummy type (like a child). I searched a quite long time to find a good one. This one has all the things we are looking for and natural. He loves them and remembering to take his vitamin without me reminding him any more because they are his candy. The only complains that I have for this is that the sugar coating. I wish they could either go without it, or at least not using refine sugar.
customer_reviews.author: HAT

customer_reviews.title: Too much sugar
customer_reviews.text: I always buy this brand, and when I recently purchased it the flavor and texture was incredibly different - they added 8 grams of sugar! Nowhere was this advertised and I didn’t know until I opened it! How do I purchase this product in the future and know what I’m getting on the inside? Honestly, usually I love it but it seems like the company keeps changing the formula?
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Expensive...$576 per year per couple!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the taste (CANNOT taste the fish oil) and the fact that all the vitamins and supplements you need are included...However, I bought this for my husband and myself. If you take the recommended amount (who wouldn't) of 6 per day, one bottle will last you 15 days per couple and per month you will spend $48 on vitamins ($576 per year, really!). As soon as I can find a lesser expensive, all natural option I will continue to use. ? Think the company knows there are few alternatives in terms of finding a complete, natural vitamin and charges as such ?
customer_reviews.author: ElleCT

customer_reviews.title: Great but just received them today.
customer_reviews.text: Received it today but the jar says expires Jan 14 2019 so I better take six a day. Taste is good. We will see. If my nails get stronger and I don’t get brain fog from the sugar then I won’t update this so you can assume it’s worth the money. They were more spendy at the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: LovelyDay

customer_reviews.title: Yummy way to eat your daily vitamins!
customer_reviews.text: I eat these vitamins every day. They have fish oil in them but don't taste fishy at all and don't have the fishy burp problem that I had with all other fish oil supplements. Don't get me wrong, these are multi vitamins, not fish oil but I look forward to my vitamin candy every day. They did not work to raise my vitamin D levels up, so it's probably good to take an extra vitamin D supplement for that, if that's something you need.
customer_reviews.author: T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: False advertising! Product has 8g added sugar.
customer_reviews.text: False advertising! The nutrition facts in the displayed product picture on the website says "no added sugar." The actually product I received has 8g added sugar per serving. Huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: D. M. SHI

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I really like that these have a bunch of different vitamins in them Easy to take daily. Good flavors. There is something about the texture though I do not like
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: We call them gum drops
customer_reviews.text: This the only other multi vitaminy daughter will eat besides the expensive Mary Ruth brand. We only give her 2 vs. the recommended adult dose.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Elofson

customer_reviews.title: Too much sugar
customer_reviews.text: I got this to take as a daily vitamin but it’s so sugary and the dosage calls for 6 gummies per day. The amount of sugar in these supersedes the benefits, way to much sugar intake per serving. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Way too much sugar
customer_reviews.text: I have been eating the organic ones for months and have enjoyed them.  I ordered these not knowing the difference. They're coated in an extreme amount of sugar and leave a bad after taste. I'm going to re-order the organic ones. It would be great to get a refund on these, otherwise I will likely just throw them out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I got these because I have MTHFR gene so they are methylfolate
customer_reviews.author: Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Read dosage and adjust to your needs.
customer_reviews.text: I took the recommended dosage for 3 days. This caused me to have dizziness and balance issues. I’m now taking only 2 per day and I feel energized. I am 67 years old with the only health issue being overweight. I don’t take any other medications.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ortega

customer_reviews.title: "Smarty Pants" is a Smart Choice
customer_reviews.text: This is the second or third bottle of "Smarty Pants" vitamins I have ordered. I like the fact that they contain Omega 3's in addition to the standard vitamins. They're gummies, therefore, easy to take; and they're very tasty, which makes it fun to take your vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: pink_icicle

customer_reviews.title: Son hates them
customer_reviews.text: My son won't take it, he says it's disgusting. It's disappointing since so many have seen great results in kids with ADHD.
customer_reviews.author: David Michael Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor. The bottle is difficult to open.
customer_reviews.text: If it does not said "only 6 a day", I think I can eat them all in one day! It tastes like a sweet candy. It is disappointed that the bottle is difficult to open. It took me 30 mins to figure out how to open the cap.
customer_reviews.author: Siyuan Song

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for adults too!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome flavor and easy to digest. They're not too gummy and don't get hard like some of the other ones I've used. I seriously love the flavor of these! I won't say anything about my overall health changes 'cause they is very very subjective and I was taking quality vitamins before these.
customer_reviews.author: Kalebk11

customer_reviews.title: Way too sweet
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these over my normal VitaFusion Adult Gummy Vitamins in hopes that it would replace having to take 2 kinds, the normal multivitamin and vitamin D3. Personally I think that these are way too sweet, they already have a sweet taste on their own and are covered in sugar. Even as someone with a sweet tooth, eating 6 of them feels like too much. I do like that they don't contain any additives and have a social good aspect of giving vitamins to children in need.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca G.

customer_reviews.title: Not the Formula as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The product is showing as the upgraded formula, however the last two bottles I've received were NOT the upgraded formula. Lower levels of vitamins and NO Vitamin K. The product I received tastes fine, looks fine, but is NOT what I ordered and that's why I'm giving it 1-star.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Leone

customer_reviews.title: Aftertaste
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect a gummy vitamin to be low in sugar, but I also didn't expect this one to be so high in sugar! It starts off tasting like you just put a spoonful of sugar in your mouth, which isn't that bad but then you realize the spoonful of sugar is meant to mask the actual gummy. I've never had a fish-flavored gummy before trying these. Now I really know what that tastes like and it isn't good! If you're willing to deal with it, I suggest chewing and swallowing quickly so you avoid the aftertaste (not easy when an Adult dose is 6 of these). I won't be ordering any more SmartyPants. :(
customer_reviews.author: Sabrothe

customer_reviews.title: Good Vitamins
customer_reviews.text: These gummies are so tasty. I’ve taken them for about a year and their quality is unmatched.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Save money- Buy these instead of childrens
customer_reviews.text: As a previous poster mentioned. These are the exact same as the childrens version. The only difference is the serving amount. Children take 4, whereas adults take 6.
customer_reviews.author: ditchqueen

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: My 4yr old doesn’t like the taste but my oldest who is autistic likes them. I can’t really tell a difference yet.
customer_reviews.author: Shasta

customer_reviews.title: Super sweet, too much sugar for me, especially when taking 6.
customer_reviews.text: I would have gave it a perfect score if it didn't have sugar on it, and I only needed to eat one or two. Taking six "sugar coated gum drops" in the morning is not good for my blood sugar levels.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gerlach

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good
customer_reviews.text: The gummies taste good...which is important when having to eat 6 in a row. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisPowell

customer_reviews.title: My family loves them!!
customer_reviews.text: The entire family loves them. I don’t have to remind anyone to take their vitamins anymore. Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Too Sugary but good vitamins
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins are good ones but they are a bit too sweet for my liking and you have to take 6 a day.I did give 4 stars because they are good just a little too sugary for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor and great taste. I would like to believe that they help with health
customer_reviews.author: AJ Vel1147

customer_reviews.title: these seem to be great for a multi vitamin but i like many others ...
customer_reviews.text: these seem to be great for a multi vitamin but i like many others didn't realize until after i ordered them that a dose is 6 chews, whereas with most brands it is only 2. so my husband and i went through this giant bottle in 2 weeks. that's a little too expensive for me to spend on a multivitamin, especially with so many brands that whose vitamins make me feel just as good for a much lower cost.
customer_reviews.author: T. Stockwell

customer_reviews.title: Hope you have a sweet tooth
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it a 5 but the recommended daily dosage is 6 gummies and it’s super sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Ohpreciousone

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: My hubby and I take these because they are full of all the good stuff!! I feel like we get sick less and feel good when were are good about taking them. My issue is you have to take some many and the taste gets too sweet after awhile when you are sensitive to this flavor like I can be.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Vitamins
customer_reviews.text: My son really likes them, it’s the first time he’s ever taken vitamins without a problem
customer_reviews.author: Doris

customer_reviews.title: Good vitamins
customer_reviews.text: I love SmartyPants gummy vitamins. I have also tried the one for women. They taste great but I think the extra sugar on it is not necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: You have to take 6 a day for an adult. My husband started refusing to take them as a few flavors were terrible. Disappointed. Too lat to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Purchased them for my granddaughter. We give her half. They are great!!
customer_reviews.author: Trapdap2

customer_reviews.title: Too much sugar sprinkles
customer_reviews.text: I gave them to my cousin I wanted them badly for me and my children, tooooo much sugar coating, I wish they had an option without the sugar. They are probably a great vitamin other than that. My cousin likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Charmain Yeboah

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: These are so good! I'll never buy another kind of vitamin again. I can't even began to explain how good these are. I have to remember that they aren't candy and I can't eat them eat them by the handful.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Cuka

customer_reviews.title: I cringed at the smell and taste wasn't any better
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed when I opened that bottle and ask those wonderful natural flavors smelled like a combination of Hawaiian Punch and fish oil. :( The taste isn't any better. I'm trying to get used to it, by don't think any amount of "organic sugar cane" can cover that. Wish I had ordered a smaller bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Yaira Resto

customer_reviews.title: Best for pain relief!
customer_reviews.text: We've been taking these vitamins for 8 months now, and will never stop! If I miss a day or two, I can tell the difference - my pain comes back. I'd say for pain relief brought on by inflammation, these are the best, hands down. I have never been able to find an Omega 3 that I can tolerate until these delicious little gummies!
customer_reviews.author: S. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!!
customer_reviews.text: A+++ We love these vitamins!! All five family member use this brand and have been taking them for over 2 years. I highly recommend. The men’s sugar coated taste the beat!
customer_reviews.author: JL Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Awful taste
customer_reviews.text: Adults needed to take 6 gummies. Should’ve read how many gummies to consume before purchasing. Might as well just man up and swallow a pill. Nobody has time to take 6 gummies in a day, haha. The taste was quite awful too.
customer_reviews.author: Jwuuzy

customer_reviews.title: Taste Nasty
customer_reviews.text: My family do not like these. The taste is not pleasant at all.
customer_reviews.author: Curvy Girl

customer_reviews.title: Easy to swallow and tastes great
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, 1\3 the price as in my car office really yummy flavor! Will buy again for sure
customer_reviews.author: Loud customer

customer_reviews.title: Taste great!
customer_reviews.text: Taste great! Almost to the point where I think these can’t quite be vitamins, but rather some new candy. Makes for easy consumption.
customer_reviews.author: NW Angler

customer_reviews.title: Best vitamin when I couldn't take prenatals
customer_reviews.text: I turned to this chewable vitamin about 14 weeks into my pregnancy when swallowing regular vitamins became totally impossible. I'll chalk that up to 1st trimester nausea. These suited me perfectly. They're sweet, taste great, and don't come back to haunt me later. I'm giving it 4 stars because taking six at a time is kind of a drag, and very occasionally I get a fishy aftertaste from the DHA-- this might be my pregnancy supertasting ability though, you may not run into this.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen Coughlan

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret buying these.
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing for my 5 year old. I’ve noticed a huge change in her behavior after taking these. Worth it. Trust me! My daughter loves the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Too Much Sugar and Not Gummies
customer_reviews.text: These are gumdrops, not gummies. They are covered in and loaded with sugar, and they leave a lingering aftertaste. And six of those a day? No thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Kaye

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves these
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband because he was always popping the children's version that I bought for my son. He saids the taste is less sweet then the kid's version but still really likes them. They are rather pricey, but I like the natural ingredients and the fact that for every bottle you buy, they contribute to Vitamin Angels to help bring better nutrition to does that need it.
customer_reviews.author: zacket

customer_reviews.title: Finally! A Delicious Vitamin!
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins taste and chew like gum drops. You are supposed to take six a day and I eat two after every meal as my 'dessert'. Plus for every bottle I purchase, the manufacturer donates a bottle to a family in need in a third world country, So a win/win as far as I am concerned.
customer_reviews.author: Lindiana

customer_reviews.title: SmartyPants Adult Gummy Vitamins with Omega 2 and D
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order of these vitamins. To get 100% of the adult requirement you need to take 6. They are slightly sour with a sugar coating. I take one or two during the day at different times until I reach 6. This is better for me than a few jelly beans during the day and satisfies that desire for something sweet. Now I don't have to take another D and Omega 3 because they are all in the gummy's.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Too many gummies a day
customer_reviews.text: The instructions say You have to take 6 of these gummies a day. That’s just too much for a daily vitamin
customer_reviews.author: James Helfrich

customer_reviews.title: bulky but complete
customer_reviews.text: they taste pretty good but you have to eat a daunting 6 vitamins. i often find myself forgetting to take them because i don't want this amount of sugar too early in the day. also i am a backpacker and they are just too bulky and heavy of an item to travel with. i need to find a delicious one a day chewable. i do love that they have omegas and vitamin d. hard to find in a multi.
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: A winner in our house
customer_reviews.text: As per other reviews, I buy the larger adult vitamin bottle for my daughter and give her just four gummies. She gobbles them up because they taste good. I like that they have more bioavailable formulations of the vitamins. I even helped myself to some of these vitamins on a recent trip abroad when I didn’t have my own. I’m normally not a gummy vitamin fan, but these go down easily and don’t hurt my stomach.
customer_reviews.author: TwoCatsAndCounting

customer_reviews.title: Too much sugar
customer_reviews.text: Only compliant I have is the sugar coating. It's not needed. They are plenty sweet enough. Sugar is not healthy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Gebhardt

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: I shouldn't buy these vitamins because they look and taste like gumdrops and I love gumdrops. Sometimes I find myself eating more that the recommended dose!
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: 6 a day!!!
customer_reviews.text: They are decent tasting an deverything, but having to take 6 for the daily dose is freakin crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy Sour Gummies
customer_reviews.text: I like these best- they have a little sugar coating which keeps them from sticking together and becoming gooey
customer_reviews.author: drmoore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my 4 year old and he keeps asking for his vitamins
customer_reviews.author: Paul Emerson

customer_reviews.title: Best Multi-Vitamin
customer_reviews.text: We all have that graveyard of supplements in our cabinets - the ones we'd have to take handfuls of every day. Whoever came up with these sour gummies is GENIUS. it is no sweat to chew up 6 of these every morning. I get my multi, my choline and inositol (brain food), Omega-3s (essential fatty acids) and they taste delicious. Who said gummy vitamins had to be just for kids!?
customer_reviews.author: AJ in DC

customer_reviews.title: Great vitamin!
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff! I used them at half dose for my toddler instead of the children’s version. Same stuff and cheaper this way.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tasty, just wish they weren't coated in sugar and you didn't have to take SO many!
customer_reviews.author: vlousabani

customer_reviews.title: 6 gummies a day keeps the doctor away
customer_reviews.text: Just started taking these. They taste better than a lot of other gummy type things. Everything is labeled clearly which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Beardy

customer_reviews.title: COVERED IN SUGAR
customer_reviews.text: They are covered in sugar. Not what I would want for a multivitamin. Used them, but won't be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff's Girl

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Coated in sugar and still tastes horrible. You have to take 6 gummies to get the recommended daily value too. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: These are tasty and have all the vitamins I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: Great vitamins!
customer_reviews.text: We love these vitamins and order them regularly. They taste great, so it helps us to remember to take them more consistently.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Has turmeric in it.
customer_reviews.text: I feel energized, but the turmeric is bothering my acid reflux
customer_reviews.author: wabash, resident

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Delicious and I remember to take this since it’s a chewable
customer_reviews.author: W. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Too much extra sugar
customer_reviews.text: I like these vitamins, but I dont like how I feel like I'm eating a bunch of sugar
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously! An adult vitamin for my Fruit Snack loving husband! He has since cut fruit snack from his diet when we went Paleo about 3 years ago, but he looks forward to his daily vitamins as do my children. So glad to find something with quality ingredients that taste great!
customer_reviews.author: MinimalistHomeSchooler

customer_reviews.title: Yes, I’d order again and again
customer_reviews.text: These vitamin gummies taste so good, they make you want to take them!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Yay !
customer_reviews.text: I have a Really hard time swallowing vitamins. I have tried all kinds, even the "petite" sized, with no luck. I can't stand the taste of liquid vitamins. I was very pleased to find these. One thing to consider, if you are on a low carb diet, I can't recommend these, especially during induction.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great. Almost too sweet with the sugar in the outside but good flavor and doesn't bother my stomach
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why the sugar?
customer_reviews.text: Why mist they put the sugar on the outside. Gross. And to force yourself to eat 6 I just cant. These gave ny husband heartburn
customer_reviews.author: Dania Posada

product_meta.title: Daily Gummy Multivitamin Adult: Vitamin C, D3, & Zinc for Immunity, Omega 3 Fish Oil, B6 & Methyl B12 for Energy, Iodine, Choline, Vitamin E by Smartypants (180 count, 30 Day Supply)
product_meta.description: SmartyPants Adult Complete Gummy Vitamins: Multivitamin & Omega 3 DHA/EPA Fish Oil, Methyl B12, Vitamin D3, 180 count (30 Day Supply)
feature_bullets: SmartyPants Adult Formula with new premium ingredients, all in one delicious serving: Beta Carotene, Vitamin B6, Vitamin K2 and Choline (Packaging May Vary)
For adults, take four (4) gummies daily. May be taken with or without food.

Non-GMO. Free of milk, eggs, peanuts, tree nut allergens, fish allergens, shellfish, soy, gluten and wheat. No synthetic colors or artificial sweeteners/flavors. 3RD PARTY LAB TESTED. No refrigeration required
15 essential nutrients: omega-3 EPA/DHA (from fish oil), vitamin K for bones, CoQ10 for heart health, vitamin D3 for immunity, vitamin B12 (methylcobalamin) for energy.*
Gummy multivitamin for adults also high in the antioxidant vitamin E from sunflower oil for the maintenance of overall good health.*
